title: Border, 1973-51-129, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  Madder colors block-printed.  Yellow and blue applied by brush.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 46.5 x 21 cm (18 5/16 x 8 1/4 in.)
Repeat H: 46 cm (18 1/8 in.)
description: Horizontal border of plants growing in a dimensional landscape. Spaces between plants filled with a fine twiggy branch on a black background.
